ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - Equipment question
ygData.msgSnippet: As other mentioned GeForce cards are IMO also most bang for the bucks. Ive not upgraded in a while: Processor: Athlon 600MHz RAM: PC133 256Mb SDRAM Sound:
ygData.messageBody:
As other mentioned GeForce cards are IMO also most bang for the bucks.
Ive not upgraded in a while:
Processor: Athlon 600MHz
RAM: PC133 256Mb SDRAM
Sound: Soundblaster live (First version on the market)
Graphics: ASUS 6800 (GeForce 1 with 32MB DDR RAM)
Network: 10Mbit LAN to a ADSL 256kb/sec

Only annoying problem I have is loading time from server select screen to
character select *shrug*...
I zone reasonbly fast when ingame, compared to others. But just to try and
get my zoning to go faster I recently expanded my RAM to 256 (from 128) but
did not notice any improvement on anything. Well I kinda expected that, but
SDRAM is so cheap these days that I just had to try.
I figure that my HD is due for an upgrade next(got a lousy UDMA33 4GB disk).

As to video lag I do not have any. My GeForce performs flawlessly at
1024x768 only times I note a slight slowdown is when ALOT casting is going
on.

Musiker, bard on bertox

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cook Miller-ETOP03 [mailto:etop03@...]
> Sent: 12. juni 2001 19:27
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] OT - Equipment question
>
>
> Tallies, I figured this a topic of interest even if not
> directly related to barding. Bards do provide a lot of input
> into what is seen in game graphically, so this can be an
> important topic.
>
> I have a 450 mhz P3 Gateway with 128 MB Ram and Voodoo 3000
> 16 MB AGP graphics card. I can't get a new computer. But
> more memory and a better graphics card are in reach due to
> Father's day. I just got 128 MB Ram - done. So now I want
> to get my fellow bards input on what graphics cards they use,
> have used and performance rating. Brand, MB, speed, anything
> else of note would be much appreciated. Currently, framerate
> in WW and some places in FV sucks - I auto follow, look down
> and hope they don't scrape me off on a tree. I can't imagine
> Luclin without a better card.
>
> Thanks again for all the help,
>
> Piemur Draggonsinger 42 bard
> Robiinton Masterrhealer 32 cleric
>
